formatted_address: 10 Sinaran Dr, Unit 08-15/16 Novena Medical Centre, Singapore 307506
name: Expat Dental Novena

reviews.text: Came for in-chair whitening service & it has a great positive impact on my teeth colour & gum healthiness. My teeth has become more whiter. I still feel pain because of the sensitivity during the procedure but the staffs said it is normal & that it will last for 3 more days. They even gave me a gel to apply on my teeth if i have this sensitivity pain popping up here & there. Overall, it is a Great experience. Great affordable price as it is now a promotion for 1st timers who wants to do the in-chair whitening treatment.

I have had a long journey with Expat Dental as  I‚Äôve addressed my missing tooth. They have been wonderful partners as we figured out the best long term solution for my unique case. Dr. Sean has been very open and fair over the course of the entire process. Happily using their services for routine maintenance moving forward. Highly recommend!

Dr. Josh he‚Äôs truly great at what he does üëçüèª He was able to spot which teeth were decaying just at a glance. Throughout the treatment, I‚Äôm glad he checked on me regularly and always explained what he was doing ‚ò∫Ô∏è. This made me feel very comfortable. Thanks to him, my teeth are now free from decay yay!! The whole team is super friendly, and it was a very positive experience overall ü•∞

Rubaab was fantastic‚Äîsuper friendly and did an excellent job with the cleaning. I really appreciated how she took the time to walk me through helpful tips for my daily dental care routine. I‚Äôve already noticed the difference! Highly recommend both her and the clinic. I‚Äôve already booked my next visit!

I have received excellent care at Expat dental for the last year and a half, with Dr. Clara and Dr. Josh for both orthodontic and dental work. Everyone from the dentist, Hygienist, receptionist are friendly and professional, totally trust their expertise and without hesitation would recommend. Thank you Dr. Clara for my lovely new smile.  üòÅ
